title: Can’t Be Left Behind - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Drama   Mature   Psychological   Romance   Smut   Yaoi
tags: Abandoned Children   Absent Parents   Abusive Characters   Adapted to Drama CD   BDSM   Brother Complex   Child Abuse   Childish Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Dark   Discrimination   Doting Older Siblings   First-time Interc**rse   F*llatio   Incest   Male Yandere   Manly Gay Couple   Masochistic Characters   Modern Day   Near-Death Experience   Nightmares   Obsessive Love   Older Love Interests   Past Trauma   Poor to Rich   Possessive Characters   Prostit**es   Sadistic Characters   S*xual Abuse   Siblings   Suicides   Tragic Past   Twisted Personality   Unreliable Narrator   Wealthy Characters
author: Lin Qian   You Sa   尤萨   尤萨阿里塔   麟潜
description:
In the second year of our parents’ divorce, I ran away with my Ge[1].

Originally, Mum took Ge with her and threw me to Dad.

Now, my household registration record only has two pages. The head of the household is my Ge, and the other page is mine.

Duan Rui x Duan Yan

Orthopaedics[2], happy ending.

[1] – Ge: Elder brother

[2] – Orthopaedics: Another way to say incest (usually between siblings). It’s a Chinese meme.>
